elements.name: Open the website.

steps.name: user navigate to the Home page

elements.name: Test the Home functionality when user clicks on 'Home' button.

steps.name: Home button should be enabled
image, H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' and paragraph 'All QA engineers can use this website' should be visible
TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed
Features items, Category and Brands should be displayed

elements.name: Open the website.

steps.name: user navigate to the Home page

elements.name: Test the Scroll Up functionality using 'Arrow' button.

steps.name: Home button should be enabled
image, H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' and paragraph 'All QA engineers can use this website' should be visible
TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed
the user scroll down to the footer
'Arrow' button should be displayed
user click on 'Arrow' button
user should be navigated to the top of the page and H1 'Automation Exercise' , H2 'Full-Fledged practice website for Automation Engineers' should be visible
TestCases and APIsList buttons should be displayed

elements.name: Open the website.

steps.name: user navigate to the Home page

elements.name: Test the Scroll Up functionality without using 'Arrow' button.

user scroll up to the top

elements.name: Open the website.

steps.name: the user launches the browser and navigates to the home page

elements.name: Test the 'User SignUp' functionality when user enter valid data to signUp and enter valid data to Create New Account.

steps.name: the user clicks on Signup OR Login button
'New User Signup!' and Signup button should be visible
the user enters name as "Hassan" and email address as "Hassan2003@gmail.com"
clicks 'Signup' button
'ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION' should be visible
the user fills in the details: select Title, Name , Email, Password as "Hassan2003", Date of birth
selects the checkbox 'Sign up for our newsletter!'
selects the checkbox 'Receive special offers from our partners!'

fills in the details: First name as "Hassan", Last name as "Ahmed", Company as "Amit Learning", Address as "123 Abdelaziz Street", Address_2 as "Apt 4B", select Country, State as "Single", City as "Alex", Zipcode as "M5H 2N2", Mobile Number as "01122334455"
clicks 'Create Account' button
'ACCOUNT CREATED!' and continue button should be visible
the user clicks 'Continue' button
'Logged in as username' , delete account button and logout button should be visible

elements.name: SetUp the Browser

steps.name: the user go to the browser and navigates to the home page

elements.name: Test the products functionality when user click on Products button to navigate the products page.

steps.name: user clicks 'products' button
'All Products' should be visible
'Search' field and button should be displayed

elements.name: SetUp the Browser

steps.name: the user go to the browser and navigates to the home page

elements.name: Test the Search functionality when user Search for a product.

steps.name: user clicks 'products' button
'All Products' should be visible
'Search' field and button should be displayed
the user enters the product name as "MEN" in the search input
clicks 'Search' button
'SEARCHED PRODUCTS' should be displayed
all the products related to the search should be displayed

elements.name: SetUp the Browser

steps.name: the user go to the browser and navigates to the home page

elements.name: Test the Search functionality when user Navigate through categories and sub-categories.

steps.name: user clicks 'products' button
'All Products' should be visible
'Search' field and button and 'category' link should be displayed
the user click on'Women' category
click on any category link under 'Women' category, for example: Dress
category page and confirm text 'WOMEN - TOPS PRODUCTS' should be displayed
all the products related to the search should be displayed

elements.name: Open the website.

steps.name: user navigates to the home page

elements.name: Test the cart functionality when user add item/s to the cart from the products page.

steps.name: user clicks on 'products' button
hover over first product and clicks 'add to cart'
success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed
the user click on 'Continue Shopping' button
hover over second product and clicks 'add to cart'
success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed
user clicks 'view cart' link
both products should be added to cart, home and Checkout button should be displayed
product details like Item, Description, Price, Quantity and Total should be displayed correctly

elements.name: Open the website.

steps.name: user navigates to the home page

elements.name: Test the cart functionality when user remove item/s from the cart page.

steps.name: user clicks on 'products' button
hover over first product and clicks 'add to cart'
success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed
the user click on 'Continue Shopping' button
hover over second product and clicks 'add to cart'
success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed
user clicks 'view cart' link
both products should be added to cart, home and Checkout button should be displayed
product details like Item, Description, Price, Quantity and Total should be displayed correctly
user clicks 'x' icon to remove the product
product should be removed from the cart page

elements.name: Open the website.

steps.name: user navigates to the home page

elements.name: Test the Product Quantity functionality when user Increase quantity of the product.

steps.name: user clicks on 'products' button
hover over first product and clicks 'view product'
Quantity field and 'Add to cart' button should displayed
Availability, Condition and Brand should be displayed
user increase the quantity to "4"
user clicks on 'Add to cart' button
success message 'Added!' , view cart link and 'Continue Shopping' button should be displayed
user clicks 'view cart' link
product should be displayed in cart page with exact quantity as "4"

elements.name: Test the contactUs functionality when user clicks on contactUs button and submits the contact us form successfully.

steps.name: the user open the browser and navigates to the home page
user clicks on 'contactUs' button
'GET IN TOUCH' and 'Contact Us' should be appeared

the user enters name as "Hossam", email as "Hossam@gmail", subject as "programming languages" and message as "Hello, I am interested in learning more about programming languages like HTML, CSS, JS, Python and Java. Could you please provide more details? Thank you!"

arguments.val: "Hello, I am interested in learning more about programming languages like HTML, CSS, JS, Python and Java. Could you please provide more details? Thank you!"

the user clicks the OK button

user should be landed to home page successfully
